Class Event
A5 Class type - Prototype
Cancels the propagation of the event. Once this method is called, any event listeners that have not yet processed this event instance will be ignored. #name cancel
finishCurrentPhase: Object. If true, the event is allowed to finish dispatching in the current phase, but will be cancelled before the next phase begins.
The object that dispatched this event.
Object The object that dispatched this event.
The object that is currently processing this event.
Object The object that is currently processing this event.
The event type.
String The event type.
Object
The phase this event is currently in. (a5.Event.CAPTURING, a5.Event.AT_TARGET, or a5.Event.BUBBLING)
Number The phase this event is currently in.
Whether this event should use the bubbling phase. All events use capture and target phases.

When shouldRetain is set to true, the event instance will not be destroyed after it has finished being dispatched. Thsi defaults to false, and it is highly recommended that you do NOT set this to true unless the same event is being dispatched on a timer, and the instance can be reused.
value=false: Boolean, Optional. If set to true, the event instance will not be destroyed after it has finished being dispatched.

Class EventDispatcher
A5 Class type - Prototype
Adds an event listener to the parent object.
type: String. The event type to be added.
method: Object. The associated listener method to be added.
useCapture=false: Boolean, Optional. If set to true, the listener will process the event in the capture phase. Otherwise, it will process the event bubbling or target phase.
scope=null: Boolean, Optional.
Adds an event listener to the parent object that fires only once, then is removed.
type: String. The event type to be added.
method: Object. The associated listener method to be added.
useCapture=false: Boolean, Optional. If set to true, the listener will process the event in the capture phase. Otherwise, it will process the event bubbling or target phase.
scope=null: Boolean, Optional.
type: String.
method: Object, Optional.
Remove a listener from the parent object.
type: String. The event type to be removed.
method: Object. The associated listener method to be removed.
useCapture=false: Boolean, Optional. Whether the listener to remove is bound to the capture phase or the bubbling phase.
Returns the total number of listeners attached to the parent object.

Sends an event object to listeners previously added to the event chain. By default an event object with a target property is sent pointing to the sender. If a custom object is sent with a target property, this property will not be overridden.
event: String|a5.Event. The event object to dispatch. Or, if a string is passed, the 'type' parameter of the event to dispatch.
Override this method to be notified of listener addition or removal.
e: Object. The event object
e.type: String. - The event type associated with the change.
e.method: Object. - The listener method associated with the change.
e.changeType: String. - Specifies what the type the change was, either 'ADD' or 'REMOVE'.

A5 Class type - Prototype
skipViewDefReset
Creates the display element.
target: a5.cl.CLViewContainer.
Set to true to disable redraws on this view (and its children) until suspendRedraws is set to false.

Called by the framework if data is passed to the view load.
data: Object. The data object.
value: Object.

value: String.
value: String.
value: Object.

value2: Object.
horizontalGradient: Boolean.
value: Object.
duration: Number. The duration of the animation, in seconds.
props: Object. An object specifying the properties to animate, and the end-values as numbers. Other special properties are also accepted, and are listed below.
obj.delay: Number, Optional. The length of time to delay before starting this animation (seconds).
obj.ease: Function|String, Optional. The easing function.
obj.onStart: Function, Optional. Function to be called when the animation starts.
obj.onStartParams: Array, Optional. Parameters to be passed to onStart.
obj.onComplete: Function, Optional. Function to be called when the animation completes.
obj.onCompleteParams: Array, Optional. Parameters to be passed to onComplete
obj.startAt: Object, Optional. An object specifying the start positions.

obj.redrawOnProgress=false: Boolean, Optional. When set to true, the view will be redrawn at each step of the animation. This allows the other views to react accordingly, but will generally be more processor-intensive, and may result in a choppier animation.

Renders a view into the render target for this controller. The default render target is the root view. Note that all other subviews in the render target will be removed. e.width: Number.

The redirect method throws a control change to A5 CL.
params: Object|String|Array|Number. Numbers are explicitly parsed as errors. String parsed as location redirect if is a url, otherwise processed as a hash change.
param.hash: String|Array, Optional. A string value to pass as a hash change.
param.url: String, Optional. A string value to pass as a location redirect.
param.controller: String, Optional. A string value referencing the name of a controller to throw control to, defaulting to the index method of the controller.
param.action: String, Optional. A string value of the name of the method action to call.
param.id: Array, Optional. An array of parameters to pass to the action method.

param.forceHash: String|Array, Optional. A string to set the hash value to. Note that unlike standard hash changes, forceHash will not be parsed as a mappings change and is strictly for allowing finer control over the address bar value.
info: String, Optional. For errors only, a second parameter info is used to pass custom error info to the error controller.

obj.delay: Number, Optional. The length of time to delay before starting this animation (seconds).
obj.ease: Function|String, Optional. The easing function.
obj.onStart: Function, Optional. Function to be called when the animation starts.
obj.onStartParams: Array, Optional. Parameters to be passed to onStart.
obj.onComplete: Function, Optional. Function to be called when the animation completes.
obj.onCompleteParams: Array, Optional. Parameters to be passed to onComplete
obj.startAt: Object, Optional. An object specifying the start positions.

obj.redrawOnProgress=false: Boolean, Optional. When set to true, the view will be redrawn at each step of the animation. This allows the other views to react accordingly, but will generally be more processor-intensive, and may result in a choppier animation.

obj.engine: String, Optional. The animation engine to use (specified by the process name, generally 'jsAnimation' or 'cssAnimation'). By default, the Animation addon will try to determine the best engine to use.

Class UITableHeaderCell
A5 Class type - Prototype
Gets or sets the column associated with this header cell.
value: a5.cl.ui.table.UITablecolumn. The column associated with this header cell.
Get or set the text label for this header cell.
value: String. The text label for this header cell.

Get or set the function used for sorting.
This function follows the same rules as sort functions for Array.sort(), but should always sort in ascending order.
The function takes two parameters, representing two items. If the first item should come before the second, return a number >= 1. If the first item should come after the second, return a number <= -1. If the order of these items is irrelevant, return 0.
value: Function. The function used for sorting

Get or set the direction in which this column is being sorted.
Possible values are a5.cl.ui.table.UITableHeaderCell.ASCENDING and a5.cl.ui.table.UITableHeaderCell.DESCENDING.
value: string. The direction to sort in. Possible values are a5.cl.ui.table.UITableHeaderCell.ASCENDING and a5.cl.ui.table.UITableHeaderCell.DESCENDING.
Get or set whether this header cell is user-resizable.
value: Boolean. If true, the user can resize the column associated with this header.
Get or set whether this header cell allows sorting.
value: Boolean. If true, the user can sort the table rows by clicking on this cell.
